problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AB=2,BC=5,若把Rt△ABC绕直线AC旋转一周,则所得圆锥的表面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, AB = N_1, BC = N_2, if Rt△ABC is rotated once around the straight line AC, the surface area of ​​the cone obtained is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB=2,∴底面的周长是:4π∴圆锥的侧面积等\frac{1}{2}×4π×5=10π,底面积为4π,∴表面积为10π+4π=14π,故选:C．
